title: Can there be a place or situation where we can travel anywhere in time but linearly in space? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes. That is exactly the situation inside a black hole. When you cross the event horizon, you are forced to always move forward in space toward the singularity. But you are free to go back and forth in time.
Not in reality, because time dose not have anything to travel through. Time is only a numerical expression for a period between two events.
